scripts.copy-to-deschutes-old: cd dist && copyfiles -u -V **/* //deschwebv12c1ff/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/provonfhir/dmr/ && cd.. && echo 'copy complete'
scripts.copy-to-cascade-old: cd dist && copyfiles -u -V **/* //cascawebvde129f/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/provonfhir/dmr/biligram-3.0 && copyfiles -u -V **/* //cascawebv0ac27c/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/provonfhir/dmr/biligram && cd.. && echo 'copy complete'
scripts.copy-to-deschutes: cd dist && copyfiles -u -V **/* //deschwebv12c1ff/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/biligram-3.0 && cd.. && echo 'copy complete'
scripts.copy-to-cascade: cd dist && copyfiles -u -V **/* //cascawebvde129f.wa.providence.org/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/biligram-3.0 && copyfiles -u -V **/* //cascawebv0ac27c.wa.providence.org/d$/inetpub/wwwroot/EpicFtr/biligram-3.0 && cd.. && echo 'copy complete'
scripts.deploy-deschutes-old: npm run build-staging && npm run copy-to-deschutes-old
scripts.deploy-deschutes-sandbox: npm run build-staging && npm run copy-to-deschutes
scripts.deploy-deschutes-prov: npm run build && npm run copy-to-deschutes
scripts.deploy-cascade: npm run build && npm run copy-to-cascade
